segments.text: You ’ re going to set up your own law office , aren ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . After so many years of hard work , I ’ d rather I had an office of my own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you need help , don ’ t hesitate to ask me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll be very glad if you would help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d like to wish you every success in your new venture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I wish I would .
segments.speaker: S2
